dialogue.text: "You have stirred. Good. You were half dead when I found you. Rest now. You are safe."
"You are in the Shir Valley, in the illage of Finn's Glenn."
"Why, I'm Roseberry, of course. This is my humble home."

"A group of farmers found you collapsed in the wilderness. You were holding this..." She points out an ancient blade among your belongings. "I had you brought here and have nursed you back to health."

options.option: What was I doing out there?
I wish to leave, now. [END CONVERSATION]

dialogue.text: The healer looks apprehensive. "I dare not touch it. It bears the mark of a terrible curse." She studies the sword for a moment and looks at you worriedly. "Any who bore this blade are doomed to whatever foul magic curses it."
"There is a tomb to the last Good King of Klathia just west of the Glen. Perhaps you were plundering it?"

"You are free to leave, but know this: The Shir Valley is relatively safe, yet the realm beyond is dangerous. Uncrowned King holds court upon the Klathian throne. His armies are vast, and his sorceries vile. Evil creatures are drawn to him in these dark times. The elven queen hides in her forest realm and the dwarven king cowers in his mountain hall. The Klathian lords have all sworn fealty to the Uncrowned King. Any who would openly defy him, especially those he has cursed, would be doomed to fail. Even those whose claim to the throne is strong."
"I know your face. You're Kryll, they call you the trueborn King of Klathia." "So, have you finally come to claim your throne?"
dialogue.option: I have come to claim what is mine, by right.
I have come to rid the kingdom of your evil.
I've come to return your blade.
